description: A change from the traditional apple, this dessert delivers sweetness with the familiar crumbly crunchy top.
keywords: Crumble,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Pear,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Pear Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 medium pears, peeled, cored and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot to a medium head with the pears, water, 50g of sugar and cinnamon. Cook the pears for 8 minutes while turning occasionally.
While the pears are cooking, combine the flour with 50g of sugar and the butter. Remove the pears from the heat and mash the contents lightly.
Place the pears into the serving dishes of choice and evenly cover with the crumble mix. Place the crumbles under a grill on medium heat and roast for 4 minutes or until its lightly browned.
